data.title: Philip Snowden, 1st Viscount Snowden citáty (5 citátů)
data.meta_description: Citáty Philip Snowden, 1st Viscount Snowden ✅ Objevte zajímavé a ověřené citáty · Philip Snowden, 1st Viscount Snowden, PC  was a British politician. A strong sp…
data.text: Philip Snowden, 1st Viscount Snowden, PC was a British politician. A strong speaker, he became popular in trade union circles for his denunciation of capitalism as unethical and his promise of a socialist utopia. He was the first Labour Chancellor of the Exchequer, a position he held in 1924 and again between 1929 and 1931. He broke with Labour policy in 1931, and was expelled from the party and excoriated as a turncoat, as the Party was overwhelmingly crushed that year by the National Government coalition that Snowden supported. He was succeeded as Chancellor by Neville Chamberlain. Wikipedia
